word_mean: 〔复thalami〕［拉］〔NA〕丘脑：为二卵圆形大质块，主要由灰质构成，位于第三脑室两侧并构成其侧壁。丘脑可分为背侧和腹侧两部分，二者都含很多神经核。不加定语的“丘脑”，一般是指丘脑背部

sentence.Network_en: It is divided into two parts, the lateral and medial thalamus.
sentence.Network_cn: 它分为两个部分 -- 外侧丘脑和内侧丘脑.

sentence.Network_en: The thalamus is the brain's major center for processing sensory information.
sentence.Network_cn: 丘脑是脑处理感觉信息的一个主要中心.

sentence.Network_en: MRI showed abnormal image in the spinal, white matter, thalamus and pons.
sentence.Network_cn: MRI示脊髓 、 脑白质 、 丘脑和桥脑均受累.

list.abs: results The responsible foci not elicited by cortical potential N20 are thalamus infarction and coronal radiation & parietal lobe infarction .结果皮层电位N20未引出的责任病灶，一是丘脑梗死，二是放射冠和顶叶梗死；
Clinical features basal ganglion hemorrhage 丘脑出血thalamus hemorrhage: 丘脑膝状动脉、穿通动脉破裂,表现为三偏症状,不同于壳核之处为均等瘫、深浅感觉障碍、特征.

list.exp: 为代表的研究者们懂患上视丘脑
list.abs: 可是以Edward Liveing为代表的研究者们懂患上视丘脑(optic thalamus)卖力视物感觉信息的加工和通报、迷走神经核(vagus nerve)卖力内脏--比如胃肠道--的功能调.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (denoting the part of the brain at which a nerve originates): via Latin from Greek thalamos

means.word_mean: 1. large egg-shaped structures of gray matter that form the dorsal subdivision of the diencephalon
